audio_global_interpretation: Good vocal presence. Balanced and effective.
speech_rate_interpretation: Slower than typical; very clear but may lack energy.
speech_rate_coaching: Speed up slightly to keep the flow engaging, while keeping clarity.
pause_ratio_coaching: Use silence to your advantage. Let your audience digest your ideas.
pitch_dynamic_coaching: Tone it down slightly. Too much variation can sound insincere.
volume_dynamic_coaching: Great dynamic range. You use volume effectively to convey emotion.
vocal_punch_coaching: Soften your attack slightly. You don't need to shout to be heard.
